backend/main.mo: Main actor defining product, inventory, order, invoice, notification types and status enums with comparison logic, including blob storage and migration mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script adding a default secondary admin email to the stored set.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of various frontend components and modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the frontend and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, bootstrap loading, and routing to login, profile setup, approval, or dashboard.
Component showing pending-approval UI with request-approval and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedApp: Placeholder shell layout with loading states, header, and footer used while authenticated content loads.
frontend/src/components/BarcodeGenerator: Generates Code128 and QR barcodes for a product using dynamic libraries and canvas rendering with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with logo, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceGenerator: Builds invoice images and PDFs by drawing structured invoice data onto a canvas with logo, metadata, line items, and totals.
frontend/src/components/LoadingWorkspace: Shows a full-screen animated loading screen for workspace initialization.
frontend/src/components/modules/Analytic: Fetches stats, orders, inventory, and customers to render charts and summaries for revenue, order status, and top products with role‑based financial access.
frontend/src/components/modules/BarcodeM: Provides QR-based barcode scanning to adjust product stock levels with confirmation dialogs and role‑restricted access.
frontend/src/components/modules/Customer: Handles listing, searching, creating, and deleting customers with dialogs and permission checks.
frontend/src/components/modules/Dashboar: Displays dashboard metrics, recent orders, notifications, and order‑status charts with auto‑refresh and role‑aware financial visibility.
frontend/src/components/modules/Inventor: Manages products and inventory with creation, editing, barcode generation, low‑stock alerts, and optional QR scanning for product lookup.
Fetches products, validates data, generates barcodes using JsBarcode, and prepares barcode canvases for reports.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceH: Displays invoice history with search, filtering, sorting, and invoice preview functionality using customer and product data.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceM: Allows creating invoices by selecting customers and products, validating stock, calculating totals, and previewing invoices.
frontend/src/components/modules/Notifica: Lists notifications with timestamps, supports marking as read and refreshing, and shows loading states.
frontend/src/components/modules/OrdersMo: Manages order listing, filtering, and creation with stock checks, permission gating, and bulk deletion support.
frontend/src/components/modules/ProfitLo: Displays profit and loss reports with date-range selection, charts, and export options, restricting access to admins and accountants.
frontend/src/components/modules/ReportsM: Aggregates sales, inventory, alerts, and financial reports with tabs and metrics, accessible only to admins and accountants.
frontend/src/components/modules/UserMana: Provides admin tools for viewing, filtering, and managing user approval statuses with sorting, searching, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for creating and saving a user profile with validation and role selection.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a role-based navigation sidebar with mobile and desktop layouts and module selection.
frontend/src/context/PollingContext.tsx: Manages global polling state for dashboard activity and active modules using React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements authentication via Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login/logout, and status tracking through a React provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines all React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs, covering profiles, orders, inventory, approvals, notifications, and reports with caching and polling logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and GPU‑optimized animations and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard layout, lazy‑loading modules based on active state and syncing with polling context.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login UI and triggers Internet Identity authentication with loading states.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceDocument.ts: Provides invoice layout constants and helpers for formatting currency, dates, line items, and totals.
frontend/src/utils/stockErrors.ts: Parses backend stock‑related errors and returns user‑friendly insufficient‑stock messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session‑based parameters with hash‑routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors from CSS variables and enabling typography, container, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s versioned state, high-level ERP description, and a detailed list of implemented features including authentication, access control, user management, admin model, and role-based modules. Serves as a snapshot for tracking functional capabilities across versions.
